content.title: Code for Success Scenario
content.body:
1. Write the following code inside define, below the declared constants - Usrname and Psword

    validate:function(){
    if( this.view.usernameTextbox.text === this.Usrname && this.view.passwordTextbox.text === this.Psword ){
    var sConfig = {message:"Your credentials have been checked successfully.", alertTitle: "Success" };
    VoltMX.ui.Alert(sConfig, {});
    }
    },
